description: 5 vibe prompts for Pentagon Protocol evaluation (1 easy, 1 medium, 3 complex)

expected_features: basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
prompts.description: A basic calculator with four operations

prompts.prompt: Create a todo list app with due dates and priority levels
prompts.description: Todo app with scheduling and prioritization

prompts.prompt: Build a personal finance tracker with expense categories, monthly budgets, and spending analytics with charts
prompts.description: Full-featured expense tracker with budgeting and visualization

prompts.prompt: Create a project management tool with tasks, team members, deadlines, progress tracking, and a kanban board view
prompts.description: Project management with kanban board and team collaboration

prompts.prompt: Build an inventory management system with products, stock levels, suppliers, low-stock alerts, and sales tracking
prompts.description: Complete inventory management with supplier and sales tracking
